website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy round table that stands out for its wheelchair accessibility and all-around easy access swing seating.
pros: Benches swing out for easy seating, or to allow access for a wheelchair
Most buyers assembled this within an hour
Surface is smooth and easy to clean
cons: The legs rust easily, so consider treating them with a rust-preventative paint
Some reports of the table arriving with missing parts
Some buyers had trouble with the minimal instructions and the assembly in general

customer_reviews.title: LIFETIME PICNIC TABLE WITH ATTACHED SWING-OUT BENCHES
customer_reviews.text: This picnic table and benches is built like a tank. Soooooo sturdy and really comfortable benches. The best feature is that all 3 benches swing out to make getting in so much easier. Kind of like a chair. Great surface...smooth and a snap to clean. Even rain does not leave water spots. I really do not see where this could be hurt because of the materials used and the quality construction. Best picnic table I have ever seen. Everyone wants to know who makes it and where did I find it.... AMAZON OF COURSE.......AND LIFETIME IS THE BEST !!!!
customer_reviews.author: CLH

customer_reviews.title: Rusting in less than 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these table on July 13, 2014. In less than 3 months they have began to rust. Once rust starts it won't stop. I'm a 3 time buyer of lifetime tables and all the others rusted too. I'm asking for a full refund, let's hope I get it. 3 times and you're out Lifetime....change you're name too.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: we have spent the past 3 weeks trying to put this cheap table together. Only to find now we can't return it. For starters the base has already started rusting. The table and the seats do not adhere to the metal base so at any time your table top and or seats could fly away. There were numerous missing parts that we have tried to reconcile with hard wear store purchases. I am extreamly disappointed and want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: kangat

customer_reviews.title: tripping hazard
customer_reviews.text: Assembly instructions difficult to follow. Biggest complaint is the 'trip hazard' caused by the brace under the seat. Additionally, the seat pivots in an arc from under the table to out from the table. I think the purpose is to allow ease of entry onto the seat. Unfortunately, the seat moves too easily on a wooden deck and can slide out from under a person as they are sitting.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, quality table! Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: A great looking, quality table. We also ordered the Lifetime rectangular picnic tables, which were easier to put together than the round. Would recommend! Company would definitely benefit by using higher-quality packing cardboard as items arrived in a box ripped and torn and re-taped obviously by shipper.
customer_reviews.author: PEmo

customer_reviews.title: Once we got all the parts it was relatively simple to put together
customer_reviews.text: Once we got all the parts it was relatively simple to put together
customer_reviews.author: daniel hill

customer_reviews.title: The package was pretty banged up
customer_reviews.text: I am trying to assemble it, but we are missing a part. The package was pretty banged up, so maybe it was lost in transit?? The part we need is the Table Top Support 1, Item BBU. I have two--supposed to have 3. The only option on your website is to return the whole table for a new one, but that is not feasible. The box is destroyed. I just need you to send me that one part and we'll be fine. I don't know who else to contact so I'm hoping somebody who can help me will read this.
customer_reviews.author: carreme

customer_reviews.title: Great Table for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Was everything as described. Put it together in about three hours, by myself. This included giving all the metal parts a heavy coat of Crystal Clear Gloss Spray Paint to prevent rust, as I live on the East Coast. Only concern is the use of short screws to attach some components. Maybe replacing them later with nuts, bolts, and washers.
customer_reviews.author: NCarolina82

customer_reviews.title: Very nice table
customer_reviews.text: Great table, little on the complicated side to putting it together. If I had had an extra set of hands it would have been easier but was able to get it together in about 4 hours on my own. It is sturdy and made well. Really like that the benches swing out and in, makes it a little easier for my 4 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Rust bucket
customer_reviews.text: We bought two tables and after only one year the connection points between table and bench had rusted through so that the benches broke off. The warranty specifically excludes rust so we wasted our money on these tables. I'll update with photos.
customer_reviews.author: It's mine

customer_reviews.title: It was hard to put together for me and the ...
customer_reviews.text: It was hard to put together for me and the nuts do not stay together, always finding them on the ground. I'm always triping on the legs.Would not buy any more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality table
customer_reviews.text: Great quality table. We are using them on a commercial site so they get a lot of use and are holding up great to both use and weather. The pull out seats are very convenient making it easy for everyone to get in and out without trouble.
customer_reviews.author: HConnolly

customer_reviews.title: very happy. space saver
customer_reviews.text: very happy. space saver, the benches move in and out easily without scattering.I can hose it off when my 3 yr old comes to visit. perfect size for children and adults alike! seems well made.(you do have to assemble. easy enough.) We do use an umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: sharon b

customer_reviews.title: Love the quality of the table and round design
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality of the table and round design. We did have a little trouble with the delivery. Seems like the large size of the box created difficulty song it's journey causing a hole to form that resulted in the loss of the assembly instructions and hardware. Contacting the distributor through Amazon was a zoo, so I searched for a number online to call directly and they were helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great table! Nice that you don't have to climb ...
customer_reviews.text: Great table! Nice that you don't have to climb to sit down. seats are not so hot in warm weather prohibiting you from sitting. Easy to put together!
customer_reviews.author: marissa

customer_reviews.title: 44 in round pinic table
customer_reviews.text: i put the table together yesterday so,i haven't put it in use yet. it arrived in great condition packaging was great. it took me approx 2.5 hrs to sssemble it .the installation for the table top was a. big problem,the installation fasterners for the top is a very poor design. i had to go to lowes and find a different type fastener before i could finish putting it together . it looks great,feels great sitting around it..the instalation instructions could be more clear. after 6 mo use , i will write another review. so far i am satisfied..d rogers
customer_reviews.author: david rogers

customer_reviews.title: I would have been very disappointed with the purchase as it would have been a ...
customer_reviews.text: Product showed up missing a bench cover. Contacted lifetime products and they handled it immediately! Had they not, I would have been very disappointed with the purchase as it would have been a nightmare to ship it back, with all it's heavy pieces and tattered box it came in. Seems well made and since Lifetime had beyond excellent service, I am quite happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Heidy Prentice

customer_reviews.title: missing packaging of screws
customer_reviews.text: i received the table but unfortunately will have to return it. missing all the screws and packaging for the screw backs in order to put the table together and instructions are complicated
customer_reviews.author: John K. Price

customer_reviews.title: We love our new picnic table
customer_reviews.text: We love our new picnic table! We keep it at our campsite and remove the seats & store in camper when not there...no use to anyone with no seats! lol
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne Saloon

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This table works great for me. Fit perfect in the area I had planned on using it. The husband put it together and said it was pretty easy. It is in an unprotected area outside so I will have to wait and see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Medic 357

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the price. This was for a community garden where funds were tight. I was told that it was a real bear to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: B. Crane

customer_reviews.title: It has been a great addition to the recipient's patio arrangement
customer_reviews.text: I gave this item as a gift. It has been a great addition to the recipient's patio arrangement, and has been much appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy (Tim) VonFeldt

customer_reviews.title: 4 starr because of instructions great quality
customer_reviews.text: this is a great value but assembly instructions could be better
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Not as easy to put away.
customer_reviews.text: Tricky to assemble the center brackets but serves its purpose. Legs do swing out, but not as moblie as the picnic table or as easy to put away.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. Very durable and my husband had no problem assembling. I love the fact the seats are moveable for sitting or getting up and out. Well made too!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Awesome table.
customer_reviews.text: The Amazon "PC Police" will not allow comments- outside their script. We had problems, the seller fixed them, great table!
customer_reviews.author: Donald W. Hudgins

customer_reviews.title: We are very happy with this table and hope to get many years ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband put this together with the instructions provided. He was impressed as to the way the nuts and bolts were packaged and well labeled. We are very happy with this table and hope to get many years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Corinelan

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap hardware
customer_reviews.text: The table fits together nicely and looks good, but the nuts, screws and bolts included are very cheap and strip easily. Beware!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Easy to put together. Now if only I could get the birds to stop pooping on it I would have the perfect outdoor table.;
customer_reviews.author: Colby Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great table for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery, great price! The quality of the table is good. The asembly was a chore, It comes in a million pieces. Overall I am happy with this table for what I bought it for which is a company outside lunch area.
customer_reviews.author: Decorator Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great Picnic Table
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Very sturdy and fits six adults comfortably or more kids. Love the swivel benches. Great picnic table.
customer_reviews.author: T. Reese

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: This table is very sturdy. We like the swing out bench seats.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Got it as a present for son
customer_reviews.text: This worked out great as a present for my son's and daughter-in-law's lake house. I understand it was at bit complicated to put together, but my son completed it. It looks great and will be a nice addition to their deck. Price was good too.
customer_reviews.author: Eric from TN

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks good fair quality just a bit small for the seating arrangements it offers
customer_reviews.author: M-Rod

customer_reviews.title: but love the
customer_reviews.text: took a lot longer to put together than you say. but love the table
customer_reviews.author: Karen Kruse

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: assembly was easy and this table seems heavy duty enough to last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this table very versatile great on our deck
customer_reviews.author: marybowen1960

customer_reviews.title: Good quality construction
customer_reviews.text: Have used this table for a year now and it has held up very well. Good quality construction. The vinyl tends to stain though from leaves and berries which is typical of vinyl material.
customer_reviews.author: DENNIS R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Set up was easy seem to be comfortable and useful.
customer_reviews.author: GloDonn

customer_reviews.title: Picnic table
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift and we received it as promised. The family was so pleased they are thinking about ordering another one. It's in their basement right now and the kids are using it for their games. Love the way the seats slide in and out. It's just a nice table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Generally Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these tables for around our community pool. The added weight of the metal legs keeps them from blowing over withb a sun umbrella inserted in the center. The first summer they held up well, now to see how they hold up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Jere L. Willsey

customer_reviews.title: Lots of screws but 2 put it togather in 1 hour 45 mins
customer_reviews.text: I liked the concept as I thought the benches went under the table out of sight as I planned to also use it as work table in the garden. All in all it turned out ok
customer_reviews.author: Bank of America

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not able to fold and put away but nice table.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great product Need good small wrench or makes putting most ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product Need good small wrench or makes putting most nuts on more difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Nel.

customer_reviews.title: Too Difficult to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product, however it is way too difficult to assemble. Hundreds of tiny pieces with no labels and not bundled together. Product also extremely heavy. Too overwhelming. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: L. M.

customer_reviews.title: Love this table!
customer_reviews.text: Took three tries to get one delivered from Amazon that was not missing parts or damaged :( They were wonderful through the entire process, though. That being said, regarding the table... we love it! It's comfortable, durable, and I especially like the adjustable benches. Very easy for my husband to assemble as well. I've read some reviews that mentioned rusting after only a couple months - I will keep an eye on that and revise my review if that happens to us! We keep ours covered with a tarp though... which may make a difference.
customer_reviews.author: InspiredbyJulia

customer_reviews.title: My husband and I put it together in a little ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I put it together in a little over 4 hours. Did some b*******g at each other but got it done. All in all we are very proud we did put it together!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley J. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best out door table I have ever bought for the money ! Comfortable and durable !
customer_reviews.author: FTH2

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but assembly too difficult!
customer_reviews.text: This picnic table is very nice, but it comes with approx. 200 metal screws, washers, etc. per table. This is crazy! It took 4 to 5 hours for the first (of 3 that I bought) by a skilled handyman, and two hours for each of the other two. I am also concerned about keeping it clean, as it is under a fruit tree (for shade) and so far has not cleaned up easily. It is normally covered, but when we use it, the cover comes off, thus the fruit problem. Nice looking and comfortable, but prepare to spend endless hours on assembly. Re the color, it appears to be white to me, not almond.
customer_reviews.author: JudyP

customer_reviews.title: Quality appears to be good. It took some time to put it together ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality appears to be good. It took some time to put it together (lots of parts and screws). I was concerned when it arrived. The shipping box was so badly damaged, I thought the table would be damaged. It wasn't.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was great for the price, must be on level surface.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Kidd

customer_reviews.title: This is even better. It's poolside so someone can sit on it ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a patio 'picnic' table where there was no need to step over support boards or get splinters when wearing a swimsuit. This is even better. It's poolside so someone can sit on it sopping wet and quickly towel dry for a non-swimmer. A seat can be angled to accommodate a large belly or snug up a child. AND, being round, everyone is facing everyone, so it's great for conversation. Outdoor restaurants should look into these for their seating! Just hose em clean.
customer_reviews.author: utopianna

customer_reviews.title: Table is great, definitely a must have for backyard areas
customer_reviews.text: Table is great, definitely a must have for backyard areas. Only drawback is the assembly, even with the directions, it can be somewhat confusing. but, end product was worth the assembly aggravation.
customer_reviews.author: Frank J Baer Jr

customer_reviews.title: Directions exactly don't skip a thing I Assembled this table in about 1 hr and should be able to do next one in about 30-45 min
customer_reviews.text: For those that had some many issues assembling this 1st follow. Directions exactly don't skip a thing I Assembled this table in about 1 hr and should be able to do next one in about 30-45 min easily
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Too complicated to assemble. I have spent 3 days and still not together
customer_reviews.author: lilrok

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy table. The benches are a bit wobbly when ...
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy table. The benches are a bit wobbly when you sit on them and can be a bit slippery. My mother slid right off! It makes a great game table and I'm certain it will last for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Mary DiBiase Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy. Like the benches swiveling to make seating easier ...
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Like the benches swiveling to make seating easier Pain getting all the pieces together - but everything was there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice picnic table
customer_reviews.text: definitely a nice table for the yard. love how you can push in the seat when not in use. there is also a hole in the center for an umbrella. as another reviewer have mention the quality of the screws are pretty bad. two of the screw connecting the center had split into two, so now they are being held together with zippy ties.
customer_reviews.author: kiarrie

customer_reviews.title: Looks great! Just what we wanted!
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a picnic table for our 7 and 3 1/2 year old children. We were looking for one that they didn't have to climb in and out of awkwardly, and one that would fit both the 7 and the 3 year old. This table is perfect and looks great. It's sturdy and fits adults as well. I rated it a 4 instead of 5 because although my husband could assemble it himself, it took a lot longer than expected. But it was packaged well, had good directions, and all the parts were correct. It's a very good product. The kids and their friends really like it and it is just what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Iarussi

customer_reviews.title: Little difficult to put together but is perfect for outdoor space
customer_reviews.text: Little difficult to put together but is perfect for outdoor space. Easy adjusting seats folds up for winter. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: charles feath

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Picnic Table for the price, but takes longer then expected to assemble. I would recommend purchasing this table
customer_reviews.author: John Fenner

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT. EASY TO MOVE. NO COMPLAINTS. WILL PURCHASE AGAIN IN THE FUTURE
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT FOR OUR BUSINESS. GREAT PLACE TO GATHER FOR LUNCH. GREAT PRODUCT. WOULD RECOMMEND ALSO FOR HOME USE. WILL BUY AGAIN IF NEEDED
customer_reviews.author: michael flythe

customer_reviews.title: It was well worth the cost but the information was ...
customer_reviews.text: It was well worth the cost but the information was very difficult to understand, some people have paid to get it assembled and I found out they were wise if they are not capable, It will get hot in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Jerold L. Davids

customer_reviews.title: 44" round picnic table
customer_reviews.text: Not difficult to assemble and should last for a good long time.
customer_reviews.author: Roland Templeton

customer_reviews.title: What a Great Table
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, Well made, and very sturdy. It is So easy to move around, and with a good base, Holds a 9' umbrella just fine.
customer_reviews.author: gary

customer_reviews.title: Great On Our Dock!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our boat dock and it's perfect. The benches slide out for easier entry and exit and the round shape is great for conversations, etc. Love IT. Thanks Amazon!! My son and husband had it together quickly and easily. Great Products these Lifetime tables. This is our second and we couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Either UPS or AMAZON/LIFETIME were neglectful here
customer_reviews.text: box was torn up, items were missing from the box, metal bent and unusable.
customer_reviews.author: BhamRedHead

customer_reviews.title: PICNIC TABLE
customer_reviews.text: MY HUSBAND AND I LOVE THIS PICNIC TABLE!! IT IS EXACTLY WHAT WE WANTED.WE LOVE THE SIZE OF IT TOO!! WAS ALOT TO PUT TOGETHER BUT OTHER THEN THAT!! IT IS PERFECT FOR US!! AND,THE SHIPPING WAS GREAT ALSO.. THANK YOU,BP
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Disaster!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this table for my mother at Thanksgiving and we started and have yet to get it together - wrong screws and all kinds of problems! Now what?
customer_reviews.author: Ms. H

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, looks great, and so much easier and cheaper than building a heavy, bulky wooden one (which was the original plan). We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Don  M

customer_reviews.title: Good table bad instructions
customer_reviews.text: Instructions could be a lot better took less time to put my grill together and no fight with girlfriend lmao

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. We love the swing out benches for making it easy for people to sit down. Nice durable, lifetime materials.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Tauscher

customer_reviews.title: Assembly
customer_reviews.text: Assembly wasn’t easy. Took me about 6-1/2 hrs. Decided to look at pictures rather than reading the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetness

product_meta.title: Lifetime Round Picnic Table and Benches, 44 Inch Top , Almond
product_meta.description: The Lifetime 44-Inch Round Picnic Table gives you that perfect extra outdoor eating space you've always wanted. Constructed of UV-protected high-density polyethylene and powder-coated steel, our picnic tables are weather and rust resistant, and will not fade, crack, chip or peel. Stronger and more durable than wood, they are low-maintenance, stain resistant and easy to clean. The benches swing outward for easy seating access, and the open frame design provides increased legroom and wheelchair accessibility.
feature_bullets: Benches Swing outward for easy seating access
Constructed of high density polyethylene for superior strength and durability
UV protected top is stain resistant and easy to clean; backed by a 2-year limited manufacturer warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars135 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
